thread.title: LIVE CHAT: Game 2 of ALCS, Blue Jays vs. Royals [Video]
thread.title_full: LIVE CHAT: Game 2 of ALCS, Blue Jays vs. Royals [Video]

title: LIVE CHAT: Game 2 of ALCS, Blue Jays vs. Royals [Video]
text:
Jays' Encarnacion back in lineup for Game 2 of ALCS KANSAS CITY - 
It's not as if the Blue Jays don't know what it's like to be in an early hole of a playoff series. 
So with that in mind, there's little panic in the team in advance of Game 2 of the American League Championship Series. 
“They all sting anyway,” Jays manager John Gibbons said. 
“I think the fact that it wasn't an elimination game, it's a longer series, maybe look at it differently. But it's important for us to bounce back today. You don't want every series to be (a come from behind) series, because then the odds get you usually.” 
The Jays will once again go with ace David Price on the mound and once again, Team Sun is live at Kauffman Stadium. 
First pitch is at 4:07 p.m.
